data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliveira, Renildo Ribeiro De, Zuanon, Jansen, Py-Daniel, Lucia Rapp, Rocha, Marcelo Salles (2010): Peckoltia compta, a new species of catfish from the Brazilian Amazon, rio Tapajós basin (Siluriformes: Loricariidae). Zootaxa 2534: 48-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.196599
